title: Shkreli tells judge his drug discovery software is not for discovering drugs
description: Shkreli now says his drug discovery software is like a recipe website.

title: Our favorite superhero misfits are back in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 trailer
description: "We'll all fly away together, into the forever and beautiful sky."

title: It’s not aliens. It’ll probably never be aliens. So stop. Please just stop.
description: "There is no indication of aliens or extraterrestrial activity with these recent takedowns."

title: Starlink, Verizon, and T-Mobile made shaky claims on FCC coverage map
description: Starlink claimed areas it doesn't serve; Verizon data undermined by network limits.

title: Ford will spend $3.5 billion to build lithium iron phosphate battery plant
description: The plant will employ 2,500 workers when it opens in 2026.

title: ~11,000 sites have been infected with malware that’s good at avoiding detection
description: It's not clear precisely how the WordPress sites become infected in the first place.

title: Apple releases iOS 16.3.1 and other updates with fix for “actively exploited” bug
description: Also includes fixes for iPhone 14 Crash Detection, Siri, and iCloud bugs.

title: Google employees criticize CEO for “dumpster fire” response to ChatGPT
description: After Google's embarrassing event last week, employees take aim at CEO Sundar Pichai.

title: Samsung 990 Pro SSD firmware update should halt—but not reverse—rapid wear-out
description: Samsung's SSD reliability has been a selling point up until recently.

title: ChromeOS will finally, mercifully, let you change its keyboard shortcuts
description: Beta build flags point to changing and adding keys for nearly all OS functions.

title: The Volvo XC60 Recharge benefits from bigger hybrid battery
description: The midlife refresh boosted battery capacity; shame it charges so slowly.

title: Michael Keaton’s Batman steals every scene in official trailer for The Flash
description: Double the superheroes, double the fun!

title: The secret lives of neutron stars
description: Astrophysicists use gravitational waves and light to trace genealogies of dead stars.

title: Z-Library returns, aims to avoid seizures by giving each user a secret URL
description: This weekend, the pirate e-book site welcomed users back with unique domains.

title: Earth’s long-term climate controlled by just 12% of the landscape
description: New work makes sense of mismatches between the lab and the planet's behavior.

title: The final shift: Which manual transmission will be the last?
description: The end for manuals is nigh, and one of these might be the last stick standing.

title: Blue Origin makes a big lunar announcement without any fanfare
description: "Although our vision is technically ambitious, our technology is real now."

title: Toyota will recall 16,680 RAV4 Primes due to faulty battery software
description: Too much time in EV mode in cold weather can drop the battery below its buffer.

title: A guide to (not) understanding quantum mechanics
description: How can we come to grips with a theory that doesn’t explain how anything works?
